first_para: Marina Augusta Pepper (8 December 1967 in Windsor, Berkshire, England; née Baker) is an English Liberal Democrat local politician, journalist, children's book author and former model and actress. She was Playboy's Playmate of the Month for March 1987.

full.extract: Marina Augusta Pepper (8 December 1967 in Windsor, Berkshire, England; née Baker) is an English Liberal Democrat local politician, journalist, children's book author and former model and actress. She was Playboy's Playmate of the Month for March 1987.
full.title: Marina Baker
